channel.title: Godaddy on Ian Carnaghan
channel.description: Recent content in Godaddy on Ian Carnaghan

item.title: GoDaddy review: A web hosting and domain registration company
item.description:
Godaddy is one of the top domain registrars and hosting companies of the world. It has over 500K customers.Â I’m one of the customers of Godaddy. I’ve been using its email hosting and domain registration service for 5 years. Here’s my review of the company.

List of GoDaddy services that I use

  • Domain names
  • Premium email address

Domain names

Godaddy website is user-friendly. It doesn’t matter whether you’re an experienced or a novice user, registering a new DN is easy with GD. The home page of GoDaddy’s official website features a text box through which you can find domain names.

item.title: Bluehost vs GoDaddy hosting Comparison and Plans (2018)
item.description:
If you are planning to launch a new WordPress blog or a website, you may have shortlisted BlueHost and GoDaddy to host your site. Isn’t it? The reason why you may have chosen the two companies is their immense popularity.

GoDaddy uses TV channels as a promotion medium. BlueHost, being a decade old company is very popular among bloggers. Today, we have shared a detailed comparison of these two hosting providers so that it becomes easier for you to buy a hosting plan for your WordPress project.
